title: Cafe Joe - Ibn Gabirol
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Western, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. Multiple locations, this one is inside a mini-mall with a few tables inside and a few tables next to it in the mall. There is a separate vegan menu which lists smoothies, salads, sandwiches, pizza, pasta, a burger, grilled "cheese", and breakfast. The "cheese" items contain a special vegan cheese manufactured by Cafe Joe. Free Wi-Fi.
